adudecalledleo.lionutils.item

Class ItemStackBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • adudecalledleo.lionutils.item.ItemStackBuilder

  • public final class ItemStackBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for building ItemStacks.
    Since:
    6.0.0

      • setTagMutator

        public ItemStackBuilder setTagMutator(java.util.function.Consumer<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag> tagMutator)
        Sets the tag mutator.

        This mutator is invoked with the result of ItemStack.getOrCreateTag() after the item is built, meaning this mutator can override the builder's other settings.

        Parameters:
        tagMutator - tag mutator to use
        Returns:
        this builder

      • copyFromTag

        public ItemStackBuilder copyFromTag(net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag source)
        Sets the tag to copy to the resulting stack's tag.

        This tag is copied via ItemStack.getOrCreateTag().copyFrom(tag).

        This copying is done after the item is built, meaning this tag can override the builder's other settings.

        NOTE: This overwrites the tag mutator!

        Parameters:
        source - tag to copy from
        Returns:
        this builder

      • playerHead

        public ItemStackBuilder playerHead(com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile profile)
        Configures this builder to build heads of the specified player.

        NOTE: This overwrites the item, damage and tag mutator!

        Parameters:
        profile - profile of player to build heads of
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        public net.minecraft.item.ItemStack build()
        Builds a new ItemStack.
        Returns:
        the newly built stack
